Howard; Roy Thomas; Barry Smith | First = Kull the Conqueror Vol 1 2 | History = ===[[Pre-Cataclysmic Age]]=== The Cult of the Serpent was a secret society of [[Serpent-Men]], formed at some point during the Pre-Cataclysmic Age, after humanity had overthrown the empires of the Serpent-Men and other demonic races. Disguising themselves as human priests, the surviving Serpent-Men infiltrated human society, becoming the secret power behind the throne of [[Valusia (Kingdom)|Valusia]]. During the time of [[Kull (Earth-616)|King Kull]], the Cult of the Serpent was exposed, when their priests made a failed attempt to replace Kull with an impersonator, and many of their number were slain by Kull and his allies.{{r|Kull the Conqueror Vol 1 2}} ====[[Siege of the City of Wonders]]==== {{MessageBox | Message = For the full presentation of this event, please consult the '''[[Siege of the City of Wonders]]''' page. }} The Cult of the Serpent would regroup and, moving openly, lay siege to the [[City of Wonders]], the capital city of Valusia. Although the siege lasted for many months, the Cult failed to break the spirits of Kull or the city's defenders.{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #148|; Host of the Serpent Cult}}{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #149|; Traitor's Gold}}{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #159|; The Plague King}}{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #213|; Conscience of the King}} ===[[Modern Age]]=== Although driven back into the shadows, the Cult of the Serpent survived into the modern era. With the Serpent-Men themselves all but extinct and driven into a limbo dimension, they relied on human cultists to carry out their orders and to provide host bodies for their spirits to possess. During the modern era, the Cult captured the [[Defenders (Earth-616)|Defenders]] and impersonated them in an attempt to deceive [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] into aiding them in recovering a pre-Cataclysmic serpent totem. With the totem, they intended to bring the other Serpent-Men back from limbo – however, Spider-Man exposed them and destroyed the totem, foiling their plans.{{r|Marvel Team-Up #111|; Of Spiders and Serpents!}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Setites]] [[Category:Setite Clergy]] [[Category:Pre-Cataclysmic Age Religions]]
